entry.title: The plan
entry.content:
Hey there,

First things first, introductions. I am João and you are a reader. Right now, I live in Northeastern Brazil and you live somewhere. Anywhere!

Through my writing, I hope to accomplish three things:

  • Write better and faster,
  • Make a log of this period of my life,
  • Explore entrepeneurship in a developing country.

Out of the three, I am sure the last will interest you more. I have read and seen much information and now it is time to put it into practice. So I will focus on the hurdles I have to jump: improving my technical knowledge, learning to talk to clients and finding a business model.

Fresh new posts every Thursday, so stay tuned.
